{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$1.4M in 2021-2022** on contracts with AEROPRO.

Across 7 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 4 have at least one amendment (57%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 243% and the average number of amendments was 4.25. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$4.8M over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 3.67 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$1.3M. The longest contract was 6.38 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$4.0M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}

- [Aeropro Inc.](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22Aeropro%20Inc.%22)
